title: QPE For Unitary Matrix
subtitle: Quantum Phase Estimation for a Matrix
description: This notebook demonstrates Classiq's synthesis for Quantum Phase Estimation on a unitary given as a matrix (e.g. e^{2 pi i A} with A Hermitian). The engine reduces depth and CX count compared to naive implementations; the example uses a random 8x8 matrix and sweeps over precision qubits.
